author: AP
title: Foreign ski workers stranded by virus get helping hand
description: U.S. ski areas employ thousands of international college students each year to fill seasonal jobs during what is their summer break
content:
MARSHFIELD, Vt. (AP) — They were far away from home — young adults from Latin America, working seasonally at U.S. ski resorts. Then the coronavirus arrived, even before the snows departed.
Though some made it home, others were stranded. But they were not aba… [+3316 chars]
